package.name: HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless
package.summary: Replacement for the default renderer that doesn't use table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
package.description: Replacement for the default renderer of HTML_QuickForm that uses only XHTML and CSS but no table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
package.notes:
The "height: 1px;" style was removed from "form fieldset li" block in the stylesheet to achieve layout compatibility with Windows Internet Explorer 7.
WARNING: This breaks layout compatibility with Firefox 1.x browsers (Firefox 2.0 still works as expected). The FAQ for this package in the PEAR manual contains solutions for getting Firefox 1.x compatibility.
(thanks to Brett Bieber and Alvin Woon for investigation on the layout issues and the provided solutions)
